SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Be welcome in Brighthome, the shining homeland!
And thus does yet another fallen hero plunge
himself into the sacred battle as a citizen of our
most fair territory!

SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I am a vampire, and immortal. In no way
can I be considered a 'fallen hero.'

SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Isn't that interesting! Ah, but your 
arrival here in Brighthome means but
one thing: you are indeed dead.

SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Henceforth, you shall
be known as Count.

SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And in my estimation, Count, you are a match
for one of our more peculiar warrior bands.
As such, you are hereby assigned to the
group known as the Generals.

SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text: Me? Dead? The lunacy of it all.

SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_010_00.text:
Me? A fallen hero?
I cannot imagine.

SUB_W17_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
What is this Emerald Wave flowing forth?
Has a new power arisen within me?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
It seems this is where the
Generals make their home.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: Oh ho! If it isn't our newest recruit!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: You are with the Generals?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Indeed! My name is Philosopher,
and you are... Hmm... Let me think...

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: I am the Dismal King, vampire lord.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, yes! You're Count. I assume this new
moniker is because there's a vampire in
another world who bears that title, mmm?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Now then, introductions! We'll start with me.
As I said, I'm called Philosopher—and although
I don't remember being one, I DO possess quite
the knack for analysis!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is Champion, a stoic man demanding of
both himself and others. Perhaps a little TOO
demanding, if I may be so bold, because the
rest of us tend to give him a wide berth.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ho there, Champion! Say hello
to our newest member, Count.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: I am no count; I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Everybody gets a new name from the king—just
one'a the rules. Speakin' of, make sure you follow
'em and fight like a demon, 'cause that's what it
means to be a true warrior.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is Warrior, protector of the weak and a
hero true. Though he looks something of a lark,
you'll never see even a trace of laughter in
those steely eyes! Methinks he's hiding it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ho, Irmran! Perhaps you would share one
of your poems for our newest member?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
My name is Warrior,
but my stanzas are gorier,
and I rhyme all the time,
so don't tell me it's a crime!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
I am no warrior;
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
This fine specimen here is Lifetaker.
I've no idea if the man kills for money,
principle, or the sheer pleasure of it,
but a truly dangerous sort is he.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: Ho, Lifetaker! This is Count.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: You're no mere man.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: I am not. I am a vampire.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: Your head will be mine.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is Hero, our leader. He's a righteous and
compassionate sort—a real good egg! That said,
he refuses to acknowledge King Din as his lord.
Something about not serving two masters?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ho, Yunchang! This is our
newest member, Count.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Mmm. This is the first time we've had someone
new join our warrior band. I don't know what
King Din's plotting here, but just do as we
tell you and we won't have any trouble.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
You people cannot stop bleating about this
'warrior band,' but I haven't a clue as to
what it means. Who even is your enemy?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
No need to be hasty there, Count!
We'll get to it after introductions.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
And finally, we have our battlefield tactician, General.
Don't let his appearance fool you: he has a brilliant military
mind, which can be rough on us when he decides to use
the full scope of our capabilities in battle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ho, General! I've brought our
newest reinforcement, Count.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
The stats King Din sent regarding this man are
naught but idle hopes. Even supposing he IS a
vampire, I'd be a fool thrice over to put faith
in such stats when drawing up my battle plans!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Thus do I put to you the question anew:
Who or what does this warrior band
of yours seek to do battle with?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: Explain it to him, Philosopher.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Brighthome is under constant assault from
the forces of Chaos. As none of the living
can stand against them, King Din has chosen
to summon fallen heroes to fight for him.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
These legions of the fallen managed to hold
back the incursions of Chaos, and we now seek
to drive them from this world for good and all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
This makes it sound as if
your war is nigh over.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text: It is NOT!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
Though my plans are perfect and our execution
without flaw, we still face the likelihood of other
bands losing their own battles—and if the king's
forces crumble, victory will as well!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_000_.text:
I will be devising an entirely new strategy to
those that have come before now that I have
a new asset to work with. Steady on, Generals!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
All right, Generals! Ears on and eyes front!
To this point, we've employed a frontal
approach and made gradual advances on
the enemy as King Din requested.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
But isolated victories are meaningless for
our purpose, which is to conquer Chaos and
bring peace to this land. So this operation
will be the one that decides the victor!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
Step one of the plan: The Generals
advance and secure the ruins.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
Step two: We leave the defense of that
position to another warrior band and
move to our next target—the temple.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
We'll avoid the enemy stronghold as we cut a
roundabout path. Their attention will be on the
ruins, so they won't expect us at the temple—
which we'll take in one fell stroke!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
Step three: Once the temple is in our
hands, we move to the Cleft of Chaos,
seal it up, and end this damnable war
for good! Questions?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
I worry that taking the temple in 'one fell
stroke' is not so simple a matter, General—
and that is not to mention that it lies on
the very doorstep of the Cleft of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
One fell stroke? More like one swell joke!
This here plan makes folk choke and croak!
You say it'll be easy? Maybe even breezy?
This whole thing makes me queasy and uneasy!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
If General says the plan's solid, it's solid.
But while I ain't worried about our end,
I AM worried about whatever mopes we're
gonna turn the defense of the ruins over to.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
Worry not. The Guvs will defend the ruins,
and they're not the sort to crack under
pressure and abandon their posts.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
Then all that's left is to execute the plan. I don't want to
see any of you lot cutting corners! Now then, Count.
You may be the greenhorn here, but you're still playing
a significant role in the battle to come—and I expect
you to get out there and give it your all!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
You direct this comment to one such as I?
It seems I shall have to demonstrate the
full scope of the Dismal King's might.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_CUT_010_.text:
Good enough then, Generals.
Let's go to work.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
As you might guess by their allegiances,
the fiends of Chaos are rather disordered,
which means they're not great at defending
a position. This is what we're counting on.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The whole operation will fall apart if we
keep dawdling, so let's get out there and
show 'em the power of the Generals!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Hard to believe we're this close to the Cleft
and you Generals still swept up the enemy!
Worry not, we'll hold the defenses until
you take the temple and seal the Cleft.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Thanks, Guv. And don't worry—
we'll have the temple in no time.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Gov
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Hm? I don't recognize you, stranger.
Are you new here to Brighthome?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_030.text:
I am the Dismal King. And while technically
a newcomer here, the insult of your words
is plain to all and chafes me greatly.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_040.text:
I certainly did not mean to chafe the Dismal King!
...Pffft! Bwaaaa ha ha ha ha! The Dismal King!
What madness! Tell me, O King, what name did
our true king, Din, see fit to bestow upon you?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Count, is it? In that case, I shall be
COUNTING on you to do fine work
out there! Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I don't care for the vibe Chaos is giving
off at this place; I fear it will prove a
rather tough nut to crack.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Whatever form they take, the fiends
of Chaos are unworthy of our fear.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, how I envy such baseless confidence!
You being here has clearly had an influence
on General, what with this reckless plan
he's cooked up for us.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Enough chatter! Let's take the temple quickly;
Guv might've been laughing, but those were the
eyes of a man prepared to die, and I don't want
any of you lot to let his days end here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_040.text: The Dismal King disappoints no one.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
That's the end, my friend,
'cause we win yet again.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Well done, Generals.
The plan proceeds apace.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_CUT_010_030.text: Now onward to the Cleft of Chaos!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the final battle.
Knuckle up, Generals!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Bad news! The Guvs have
withdrawn from the ruins!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Not a matter of courage. Guv held fast,
but King Din ordered them to withdraw.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
We'll never seal up the Cleft of Chaos
with only a single base of operations.
Ready yourselves, all! We're falling back!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
We'll have to fight our way back.
This won't be easy.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
We're calling a retreat when
we've got our foes beat?
I don't dispense what's dense,
but this makes no sense!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
A successful escape can also
be its own sort of victory.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Times like these are when the true value of
a warrior is called into question. So long as
your spirit is true, ya can give it your all no
matter what situation ya find yourself in!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_020_010.text:
And you claim to have so
true a spirit, Champion?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Sure do! Not that it's the kinda thing
you go showin' off to others.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
I swore my band would hold our ground,
king's order or no—and I now swear anew
to make amends for my shameful actions.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
You've done nothing save follow the orders
that were given you. So hold your head high,
for we'll be counting on you in the future
when we work together once more.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: What was that?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
General. Such is his ritual
when a plan goes sideways.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sorta his way to mentally reset.
He'll be back to normal soon.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
For what possible reason could
King Din have ordered a withdrawal?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
He claimed he didn't want to lose more
valuable warriors, but I'm unconvinced.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
I fear General's ritual is going
to take longer than usual today.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: Ah, there. I think he's done.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
It all makes sense now! King Din
doesn't seek victory—he wants
this war to go on forever!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sadly, I came to the same conclusion myself.
It's not King Din himself, per se, but more
just the sort of world Brighthome is.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
And why didn't you SAY anything
about this conclusion, Philosopher!?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
Because it would have done naught but harm morale.
We've no way out of this, after all, so it's more
constructive to throw ourselves in battle each day
believing that victory will come.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: I see a way out.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
What, killing King Din? If Philosopher
is right about this place, lopping off
the king's head would be meaningless.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
It wouldn't be worth the exertion to slay a
self-proclaimed hegemon like him. No, if the
way of this world is one of eternal conflict,
you have but to leave it. Nothing more.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: Leave Brighthome? Lunacy!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
We came here 'cause we died.
Tellin' us to leave is basically
tellin' us to die for good!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
All is unknown; we know not what might happen 
if we abandon this world, where we might go,
or even how we would leave in the first place.
We know nothing.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
That idea's really fraught.
Makes more sense than it ought.
And it's running through our minds,
but we're pretending that it's not!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: And what of you, Warrior?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
Why was I brought here? It's not really clear.
Was it to make amends? Make friends? Depends.
If you're asking me, I don't see the point.
So if you wanna go, I say we blow this joint!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
You have shown your true colors, unhuman one.
You create unease in people and then beckon
them unto sin. That is what you are.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: You've no unease, Lifetaker?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
I gave up such things long ago.
All that remains is to find an
opening where I can kill you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text: I wish you luck in that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
Can you really do it, Count?
Leave Brighthome, I mean.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_CUT_000_.text:
I'll know once I go
to King Din's castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I don't recall summoning you, Count.
What is the meaning of this!?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_010.text: I have no business with you. Begone.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_020.text: This is the room where I awakened.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
There's no question that the wave
guiding me leads through this door.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
It seems I came to this
world only to meet you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
But now, each of you must determine for
himself whether or not to step over the
threshold and witness what lies beyond.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
This place is a bore! Snore! A chore!
So take me somewhere fun,
'cause I'm ready to be done.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Perhaps I'll set off in search of
the perfect victory I seek.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The inquisitive spirit toward the unknown
which sleeps within me has been awakened!
...Or at least that's what it feels like.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
So the true challenge lies ahead?
Guess I still got a ways to go.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_100.text: I will kill you, unhuman one.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm Hero! I'm Hero! I'm Hero!
And I'm gonna take that step!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_000_.text:
It seems this is where the
Generals make their home.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_000_.text: Oh ho! If it isn't our newest recruit!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
No matter how many times we fight,
we haven't been able to secure victory.
Has there been a flaw in my strategies?
Is our warrior band not strong enough?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
No! It's because of our commander, King Din!
He has no desire to win the war, which means
victory will forever slip through our grasp!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
And that's why we're time going to
use a different strategy this time.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
King Din himself will lead our main
force and assault the fortress.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
At the same time, the Generals
will make for his castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
Once there, we will withdraw entirely from the
war here in Brighthome, for there is no meaning
in continuing to fight on a battlefield where we
can never achieve victory.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
I'm to leave this world so shortly
after arriving? A shame; I'd hoped
to do a little sightseeing first.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
General thinks withdrawing from battle is
our best option, and our job is to follow
his orders to the end.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
I remain unconvinced by this strategy.
This is the first time something like
this has happened, and I...

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_CUT_010_.text:
Don't worry. I won't allow
King Din's soldiers to interfere.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_000.text:
This room is where it started for
each of us—which means this room
is where we can end it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm heading off on a journey
to a battlefield where I can
achieve a perfect victory!

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_020.text:
If I wanna grow more,
I need a new fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_030.text:
It doesn't matter where I go,
because I'll always have fresh meat.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_040.text: Is this the end of my heroic dream?

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_050.text:
I can't say I hated the endless
battle in Brighthome, but still.

SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_100_CUT_000_070.text:
I feel as if I'm caught up in a current,
and I care not for it.
